pages.text: $(li)The End Crystal Armor is the best armor that you can create.$(br)$(li)The durability of this armor is even better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/netherite_armor)Netherite Armor$(/l).$(br)$(li)When you are wearing any piece of this set and you make a critical attack, you obtain the Regeneration II effect, regenerating your life.

pages.name: End Crystal Armor
pages.text: $(li)This armor has Armour Toughness, giving you an extra protection from strong attacks.$(br)$(li)It has Knockback Resistance too, helping you to resist that other enemies push you far away.$(br)$(li)If you are wearing any piece of this suit, the Pigmen will not be aggressive towards you.

pages.name: End Crystal Armor
pages.text: $(li)The End Crystal Armor can be made by placing the specific $(l:patchouli:armors/diamond_armor)Diamond Armor$(/l) piece and an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/end_crystal_ingot)End Crystal Ingot$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smithing_table)Smithing Table$(/l).
